authors: Contributors to Batman:The Animated Series Wiki
data.meta_description: Bud Cort is an American film and stage actor, writer, and director widely known for his portrayals of Harold in Hal Ashby's 1971 film Harold and Maude and the titular hero in Robert Altman's 1970 film Brewster McCloud. He provided the voice for a minor character in Batman: The Animated Series...
data.text:
Bud Cort General Information Birth Name: Walter Edward Cox Birth Date: March 29, 1948 Birth Place: New Rochelle, New York, United States Death Date: N/A Character(s) Portrayed: Josiah Wormwood

Bud Cort is an American film and stage actor, writer, and director widely known for his portrayals of Harold in Hal Ashby's 1971 film Harold and Maude and the titular hero in Robert Altman's 1970 film Brewster McCloud. He provided the voice for a minor character in Batman: The Animated Series.

Characters portrayed by Bud Cort in Batman: The Animated Series[]

[]
